channel.title: Fast and Furious on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Fast and Furious on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: EVs Have Gotten Too Powerful
item.description: When an entry-level Volvo can get to 60 mph quicker than a Porsche 911, and in the same time as a Ferrari, electric car makers need a reset.
